scripts._dev_note: long-lived dev server; not part of npm install or Vercel build
scripts._build_note: Logs build env before `next build`; using webpack because Turbopack panics on app/globals.css, so lint/tests/migrations are still excluded
scripts._build:turbopack_note: For debugging Turbopack issues only â€“ not used for real builds
scripts._analyze_note: build analyzer wraps build and is even heavier when enabled
scripts._profile-build_note: profiles the build process; can be long-running
scripts._vercel:build_note: runs Vercel CLI build which bundles and may be slow
scripts._start_note: long-lived server for production, not run automatically
scripts._lint_note: static analysis; can take noticeable time on large repos
scripts._test_note: runs unit tests; may take a while depending on suite
